editor.configs_help: Attach optional custom configuration snippets to this template.

editor.settings_help: Define the settings exposed by this template and their default values.

toast.autoconf_disclaimer_bold: If the service is removed or restarted, your UI configuration will be lost.
toast.autoconf_disclaimer_detail: This is because the service's method is 'autoconf', which is designed to prevent configuration conflicts.
toast.global_settings_applied_body: Global settings have been successfully fetched and applied to the current form.
toast.global_settings_failed_body: An error occurred while fetching global settings.

tooltip.auto_lets_encrypt: Whether to automatically request a Let's Encrypt certificate.

button.force_check: Schedules a check; downloads only if updates exist.
button.force_update: Skips checks and forces PRO plugin download; keeps current state on failure.

tooltip.cannot_delete_original_ban: Cannot delete the original Ban entry.
tooltip.cannot_remove_disabled: Cannot remove because one or more settings are disabled.
tooltip.certificate_priority: Choose whether to prioritize the certificate from the file path or from the base64 data.
tooltip.challenge_type: The challenge type to use for Let's Encrypt verification (http or dns).

config_type.crs_plugins_after: Configurations applied after the OWASP Core Rule Set plugins are loaded.
config_type.crs_plugins_before: Configurations applied before the OWASP Core Rule Set plugins are loaded.
config_type.default_server_http: Configurations at the Server level of Nginx, specifically for the 'default server' block, used when the client request doesn't match any configured server name.
config_type.http: Configurations applied globally at the HTTP level of Nginx.
config_type.modsec: ModSecurity configurations applied after the OWASP Core Rule Set is loaded, or used if the Core Rule Set is not loaded.
config_type.modsec_crs: ModSecurity configurations applied before the OWASP Core Rule Set is loaded.
config_type.server_http: Configurations applied at the HTTP Server (virtual host) level of Nginx.
config_type.server_stream: Configurations applied at the Stream Server level of Nginx.
config_type.stream: Configurations applied globally at the Stream level of Nginx.

tooltip.confirm_password_match: Confirm password must match the password entered above.
tooltip.copy_https_only: The copy feature is only available over HTTPS.
tooltip.custom_ssl_cert_data: The custom SSL certificate data (PEM format or Base64 encoded).
tooltip.custom_ssl_cert_path: Path to the custom SSL certificate file.
tooltip.custom_ssl_key_data: The custom SSL private key data (PEM format or Base64 encoded).
tooltip.custom_ssl_key_path: Path to the custom SSL private key file.
tooltip.disabled_db_readonly: Disabled: The database is in read-only mode.
tooltip.disabled_draft: Disabled: Service is in Draft mode.
tooltip.dns_check_url: If the page shows 'ok', the server name is likely available.
tooltip.dns_credential_items: Credentials for the DNS provider, used for DNS challenges (e.g., 'cloudflare_api_token=123456'). Required format depends on the provider.
tooltip.dns_credentials_dns_only: Credentials are only applicable for DNS challenges.
tooltip.dns_propagation: Time (in seconds) to wait for DNS changes to propagate during DNS challenges.
tooltip.dns_propagation_dns_only: DNS propagation delay is only applicable for DNS challenges.
tooltip.dns_provider: The DNS provider to use for Let's Encrypt DNS challenges.
tooltip.dns_provider_dns_only: DNS provider selection is only applicable for DNS challenges.
tooltip.draft_toggle_disabled: Draft mode can only be toggled for services created via the UI.
tooltip.email_lets_encrypt: The email address to register with Let's Encrypt for certificate management and notifications.
tooltip.email_length: Email must be between 1 and 256 characters.
tooltip.follow_latest_page_only: Follow mode is only available on the latest page
tooltip.fetch_global_settings: Fetch global settings and apply them to the current template
tooltip.lets_encrypt_custom_profile: The custom profile to use for Let's Encrypt (e.g. 'my_custom_profile').
tooltip.lets_encrypt_disable_public_suffixes: Disable certificate requests for domains matching the Public Suffix List (recommended).
tooltip.lets_encrypt_profile: The profile to use for Let's Encrypt (classic, tlsserver, shortlived).
tooltip.latest_version_installed: You are running the latest version.
tooltip.multisite_setting: This is a multisite setting, affecting multiple services if defined globally.
tooltip.no_cache: No cache files found for this job.
tooltip.no_history: No execution history found for this job.
tooltip.no_page_available: No dedicated page available for this plugin.
tooltip.password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and include 1 uppercase letter, 1 number, and 1 special character.
tooltip.readonly_db_action_disabled: Disabled: The database is in read-only mode.
tooltip.readonly_user_action_disabled: Disabled: Your account is read-only, action '{{action}}' disabled.
tooltip.real_ip_from: List of trusted IPs / networks, separated with spaces, where proxied requests come from.
tooltip.real_ip_from_urls: List of URLs containing trusted IPs / networks, separated with spaces, where proxied requests come from. Also supports file:// URLs and and auth basic using http://user:pass@url scheme.
tooltip.real_ip_header: HTTP header containing the real IP or special value proxy_protocol for PROXY protocol.
tooltip.real_ip_recursive: Perform a recursive search in the header container IP address.
tooltip.remove_ban_entry: Remove this ban entry from the list.
tooltip.reset_template_settings: Reset all settings in the current template view to their defaults.
tooltip.select_file_to_follow: Select a file to enable follow mode
tooltip.server_name: The primary domain name or server name for this service.

templates.name: The user-defined or auto-generated Template name

bans.country: Country of the banned IP address
bans.date: Date and time when the Ban was created
bans.end_date: Date and time when the Ban expires
bans.scope: Scope of the ban (Global or Service-specific)
bans.service: Service where the ban originated (if scope is Service-specific)
bans.time_left: Time remaining until the Ban expires

cache.actions: Actions available for this cache file
cache.job_name: Job that generated this cache file
cache.last_update: Date and time when the cache file was last updated
cache.plugin: Plugin associated with the job that generated this cache file
cache.service: Service associated with this cache file (or Global)

configs.actions: Actions available for this Custom Config
configs.checksum: Checksum of the Custom Config content
configs.method: Creation method of the Custom Config (e.g., ui, file)
configs.name: Name of the Custom Config
configs.service: Service associated with the Custom Config (or Global)
configs.template: Indicates if the Custom Config originates from a template
configs.type: Type or context of the Custom Config (e.g., HTTP, MODSEC)

instances.created: Date and time when the Instance was first registered
instances.health: Health status of the Instance (Up, Down, Loading)
instances.hostname: Hostname or URL of the Instance
instances.last_seen: Date and time when the Instance was last seen
instances.method: Creation method of the Instance (e.g., ui, autoconf)
instances.name: User-defined or auto-generated name of the Instance
instances.type: Type of the Instance (e.g., Container, Static)

jobs.async: Indicates if the Job runs asynchronously
jobs.last_run: Status of the last Job execution (Success/Failed)
jobs.name: Name of the Job
jobs.reload: Indicates if the Job triggers a BunkerWeb reload

plugins.method: Creation method of the Plugin (e.g., ui, core)
plugins.name: Name of the Plugin
plugins.stream: Indicates if the plugin supports stream mode
plugins.type: Type of the Plugin (Core, External, Pro, UI)

reports.country: Country associated with the reported IP address
reports.data: Additional data related to the report
reports.date: Date and time when the report was generated
reports.ip_address: IP address that triggered the report
reports.method: HTTP method of the reported request
reports.reason: Reason why the report was generated
reports.request_id: The unique identifier for the request
reports.security_mode: Security mode active when the report was generated
reports.server_name: Server name (vhost) that generated the report
reports.status_code: HTTP status code returned for the reported request
reports.url: URL targeted in the reported request
reports.user_agent: User-Agent string from the reported request

table.select_rows_for_action: Please select one or more rows to perform an action.

services.created: Date and time when the Service was created
services.last_update: Date and time when the Service was last updated
services.method: Creation method of the Service (e.g., ui, file)
services.name: Name of the Service
services.template: The template used by the Service

tooltip.ui_host: The hostname or IP address that will serve the BunkerWeb UI via the reverse proxy.
tooltip.ui_url: The URL path used to access the BunkerWeb UI via the reverse proxy.
tooltip.ui_url_security: Using a non-standard, hard-to-guess URL path enhances security.
tooltip.use_custom_ssl: Whether to use a custom SSL certificate instead of Let's Encrypt.
tooltip.use_lets_encrypt_staging: Whether to use the Let's Encrypt staging environment for testing (generates untrusted certificates).
tooltip.username_length: Username must be between 1 and 256 characters.
tooltip.wildcard_certificates: Generate wildcard certificates (*.domain.com). Requires DNS challenge.
tooltip.wildcard_dns_only: Wildcard certificates are only supported with the DNS challenge type.

validation.ip_global_duplicate: This IP address is already globally banned.
validation.ip_service_duplicate: This IP address is already banned for the selected service ({{service}}).
validation.pattern: Please enter a valid value for {{field}}.
validation.service_required_for_ban: A service must be selected for a service-specific ban.
